S06sspp2_2u:1_0: athāyuṣmāñ chāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:1_1: katham āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate? katama āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvaḥ? katamā prajñāpāramitā? katamopaparīkṣā?
S06sspp2_2u:2_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:2_2: katamo bodhisattva iti, bodhir eva sattvas tenocyate bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_2u:2_3: tayā ca bodhyā sarvadharmāṇām ākārān jānāti na ca tān dharmān abhiniviśate.

S06sspp2_2u:16_0: āha: katame āyuṣman subhūte sarvadharmāṇām ākārāḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:17_0: subhūtir āha: yair āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ sarvadharmā ākāryante,
S06sspp2_2u:17_1: yad uta rūpair vā śabdair vā gandhair vā rasair vā sparśair vā ādhyātmikair vā bāhyair vā dharmaiḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtā dharmā yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittair ākāryante,
S06sspp2_2u:18_2: katamā prajñāpāramiteti? āramitaiṣāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yad ucyate prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_2u:18_3: kasmād āramitā? āramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra skandhebhyas tad ucyate.
S06sspp2_2u:19_4: āramitā āratā ṣaḍbhyo gatibhyas tad ucyate.
S06sspp2_2u:22_6: āramitā āratā āryāṣṭāṅgān mārgāt tad ucyate,
S06sspp2_2u:22_17: āramitā āratā tathāgatabalebhyas (ŚsP II-2 5) tad ucyate,
S06sspp2_2u:23_0: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇāramitaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_2u:24_1: katamopaparīkṣaṇeti, ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ nityam ity upaparīkṣate nānityam iti,
S06sspp2_2u:24_2: na rūpaṃ sukham ity upaparīkṣate na duḥkham iti,
S06sspp2_2u:24_4: na rūpaṃ śubham ity upaparīkṣate nāśubham iti,
S06sspp2_2u:24_5: na rūpaṃ śūnyam ity upaparīkṣate nāśūnyam iti,
S06sspp2_2u:24_6: na rūpaṃ nimittam ity upaparīkṣate nānimittam iti,
S06sspp2_2u:24_7: na rūpaṃ praṇihitam ity upaparīkṣate nāpraṇihitam iti,
S06sspp2_2u:24_8: na rūpaṃ śāntam ity upaparīkṣate nāśāntam iti,
S06sspp2_2u:24_9: na rūpaṃ viviktam ity upaparīkṣate nāviviktam iti.

S06sspp2_2u:116_4: na samādhīñ chūnyā ity upaparīkṣate nāśūnyā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:116_5: na samādhīn nimittā ity upaparīkṣate nānimittā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:116_6: na samādhīn praṇihitā ity upaparīkṣate nāpraṇihitā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:116_7: na samādhīñ chāntā ity upaparīkṣate nāśāntā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:116_8: na samādhīn viviktā ity upaparīkṣate nāviviktā iti.
S06sspp2_2u:116_10: na dhāraṇīmukhāni sukhānīty upaparīkṣate na duḥkhānīti,
S06sspp2_2u:117_1: na tathāgatabalāni sukhānīty upaparīkṣate na duḥkhānīti,
S06sspp2_2u:117_7: na tathāgatabalāni śāntānīty (ŚsP II-2 26) upaparīkṣate nāśāntānīti,
S06sspp2_2u:118_1: na vaiśāradyāni sukhānīty upaparīkṣate na duḥkhānīti,
S06sspp2_2u:119_0: na pratisaṃvido nityā ity upaparīkṣate nānityā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:119_1: na pratisaṃvidaḥ sukhā ity upaparīkṣate na duḥkhā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:119_3: na pratisaṃvidaḥ śubhā ity upaparīkṣate nāśubhā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:119_4: na pratisaṃvidaḥ śūnyā ity upaparīkṣate nāśūnyā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:119_5: na pratisaṃvido nimittā ity upaparīkṣate nānimittā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:119_6: na pratisaṃvidaḥ praṇihitā ity upaparīkṣate nāpraṇihitā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:119_7: na pratisaṃvidaḥ śāntā ity upaparīkṣate nāśāntā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:119_8: na pratisaṃvido viviktā ity upaparīkṣate nāviviktā iti.
S06sspp2_2u:120_1: na mahāmaitrīṃ sukhety upaparīkṣate na duḥkheti,
S06sspp2_2u:121_1: na mahākaruṇāṃ sukhety upaparīkṣate na duḥkheti,
S06sspp2_2u:122_0: nāveṇikabuddhadharmān nityā ity upaparīkṣate nānityā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:122_1: nāveṇikabuddhadharmān sukhā ity upaparīkṣate na duḥkhā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:122_2: nāveṇikabuddhadharmān ātmāna ity upaparīkṣate nānātmāna iti,
S06sspp2_2u:122_3: nāveṇikabuddhadharmāñ chubhā ity upaparīkṣate nāśubhā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:122_4: nāveṇikabuddhadharmāñ chūnyā ity (ŚsP II-2 27) upaparīkṣate nāśūnyā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:122_5: nāveṇikabuddhadharmān nimittā ity upaparīkṣate nānimittā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:122_6: nāveṇikabuddhadharmān praṇihitā ity upaparīkṣate nāpraṇihitā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:122_7: nāveṇikabuddhadharmāñ chāntā ity upaparīkṣate nāśāntā iti,
S06sspp2_2u:122_8: nāveṇikabuddhadharmān viviktā ity upaparīkṣate nāviviktā iti.
S06sspp2_2u:123_1: na sarvajñatāṃ sukhety upaparīkṣate na duḥkheti,
S06sspp2_2u:124_1: na mārgākārajnatāṃ sukhety upaparīkṣate na duḥkheti,
S06sspp2_2u:125_1: na sarvākārajñatāṃ sukhety upaparīkṣate na duḥkheti,
S06sspp2_2u:126_0: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān evam upaparīkṣate.
S06sspp2_2u:127_0: āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi? yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:127_1: yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:127_2: yaḥ saṃjñāyā anutpādo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_2u:127_3: yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:128_1: yaś cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo (ŚsP II-2 28) na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:128_4: yo jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_2u:129_6: yo dharmāṇām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:132_1: yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:132_2: yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:132_3: yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:132_4: yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:132_5: yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:132_6: yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
S06sspp2_2u:133_1: yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:133_3: yas tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:133_4: yo vāyudhātor anutpādo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:133_5: ya ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:133_6: yo vijñānadhātor anutpādo na so vijñānadhātuḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:134_2: yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:134_5: (ŚsP II-2 29) yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasyānutpādo na sa ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:134_7: yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:134_8: yas tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_2u:134_11: yo jāter anutpādo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:135_1: yo dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:135_2: yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:135_3: yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:135_4: yo vīryapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:135_5: yo dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:135_6: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_2u:136_2: yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:136_4: yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:136_5: yo mahāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:136_6: yaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:136_7: yaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:136_10: yo navarāgraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā navarāgraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:136_12: yaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:136_13: yaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:136_14: yaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:136_17: yaḥ svabhavaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:137_1: yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06sspp2_2u:137_2: yaḥ samyakprahāṇānām anutpādo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
S06sspp2_2u:137_3: ya ṛddhipādānām anutpādo na ta ṛddhipādāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:137_5: yo balānām anutpādo na tāni balāni,
S06sspp2_2u:137_6: yo bodhyaṅgānām anutpādo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
S06sspp2_2u:137_7: ya āryāṣṭāṅgasyānutpādo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:137_8: ya āryasatyānām anutpādo na tāny āryasatyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:137_9: yo dhyānānām anutpādo na tāni dhyānāni,
S06sspp2_2u:137_11: ya ārūpyasamāpattīnān anutpādo na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:137_12: (ŚsP II-2 30) yo vimokṣāṇām anutpādo na te vimokṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:137_14: yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anutpādo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
S06sspp2_2u:137_15: ya abhijñānām anutpādo na tā abhijñāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:137_16: yaḥ samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhayaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:137_17: yo dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06sspp2_2u:137_18: yas tathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni tathāgatabalāni,
S06sspp2_2u:137_19: yo vaiśāradyānām antpādo na tāni vaiśāradyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:137_20: yaḥ pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tā pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:137_21: yo mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sā mahāmaitrī,
S06sspp2_2u:137_22: yo mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā karuṇā,
S06sspp2_2u:137_23: ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:138_0: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi? yaḥ sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_2u:138_1: yo mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_2u:138_2: yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06sspp2_2u:139_0: subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ rūpeṇa yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tad rūpaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:139_1: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:139_2: vedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā vedanayā yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā na sā vedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:139_3: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:139_4: saṃjñāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā saṃjñayā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā na sā saṃjñā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:139_5: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ saṃjñāyā anutpādo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_2u:139_6: saṃskārā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāḥ saṃskārair ya āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā na te saṃskārā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:139_7: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:139_8: vijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ vijñāneṇa yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:139_9: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam.
S06sspp2_2u:140_0: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ cakṣuṣā yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tac cakṣur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:140_1: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yac cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:140_2: śrotram āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ śrotreṇa yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tac chrotraṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:140_3: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śrotrasyānutpādo na tac chrotraṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:140_4: ghrāṇam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra (ŚsP II-2 31) śūnyaṃ ghrāṇena yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tad ghrāṇaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:140_5: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo ghrāṇasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:140_6: jihvāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā jihvayā yāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā na sā jihvā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:140_7: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_2u:140_8: kāya āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ kāyeṇa ya āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyo na sa kāyo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:140_9: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ kāyasyānutpādo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:140_10: mana āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ manasā yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tan mano notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:140_11: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo manaso 'nutpādo na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:141_0: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ rūpeṇa yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tad rūpaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:141_1: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:141_3: yaś ca śūnyo na sa śabdo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:141_4: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śabdasyānutpādo na sa śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:141_5: gandha āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyo gandhena yaś ca śūnyo na sa gandho notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:141_6: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo gandhasyānutpādo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:141_7: rasa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyo rasena yaś ca śūnyo na sa raso notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:141_8: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo rasasyānutpādo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:141_10: yaś ca śūnyo na sa sparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:141_11: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:141_12: dharmā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā dharmair ye ca śūnyā na te dharmā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:141_13: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dharṃānām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:142_1: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:142_2: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaś cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:142_4: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tac chrotravijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:142_5: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śrotravijñānasyānutpādo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:142_7: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:142_8: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo ghrāṇavijñānasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:142_9: jihvāvijñānam āyuṣmañ (ŚsP II-2 32) chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ jihvāvijñānena,
S06sspp2_2u:142_10: yac ca śūnyaṃ na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:142_11: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jihvāvijñānasyānutpādo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:142_13: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tat kāyavijñānaṃ notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yat kāyavijñānasyānutpādo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:142_15: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan manovijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:142_16: anena āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo manovijñānasyānutpādo na tan manovijñānam.
S06sspp2_2u:143_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena yaś ca śūnyo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:143_1: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:143_3: yaś ca śūnyo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:143_4: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:143_6: yaś ca śūnyo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:143_7: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:143_9: yaś ca śūnyo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:143_10: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jihvāsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:143_12: yaś ca śūnyo na sa kāyasaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:143_13: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:143_15: yaś ca śūnyo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:143_16: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo manaḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:144_1: yā ca śūnyā na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:144_2: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyaya vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:144_4: yā ca śūnyā na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:144_5: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ (ŚsP II-2 33) śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:144_7: yā ca śūnyā na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:144_8: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:144_10: yā ca śūnyā na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:144_11: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:144_13: yā ca śūnyā na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:144_14: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:144_16: yā ca śūnyā na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:144_17: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
S06sspp2_2u:145_1: yaś ca śūnyo na sa pṛthivīdhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:145_2: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:145_4: yaś ca śūnyo na so 'bdhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:145_5: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bdhātor anutpādo na so 'bdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:145_7: yaś ca śūnyo na sa tejodhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:145_8: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yas tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:145_10: yaś ca śūnyo na sa vāyudhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:145_11: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vāyudhātor anutpādo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:145_13: yaś ca śūnyo na sa ākāśadhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:145_14: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:145_16: yaś ca śūnyo na sa vijñānadhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:145_17: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vijñānadhātor anutpādo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:146_2: yā ca śūnyā na sāvidyā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_3: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo avidyāyā anutpādo na sāvidyā,
S06sspp2_2u:146_5: ye ca śūnyā na te saṃskārā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_6: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ vijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ vijñānena,
S06sspp2_2u:146_7: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_8: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_10: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāmarūpaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_11: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_13: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_14: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasyānutpādo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_16: yaś ca śūnyo na sa sparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_17: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_19: yā ca śūnyā na sā vedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_20: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vedanāyām anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:146_22: yā ca śūnyā na sā tṛṣṇā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_23: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yas tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_2u:146_25: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tad upādānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_26: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad upādānasyānutpādo na tad upādānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_28: yaś ca śūnyo na sa bhavo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_29: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo bhavasyānutpādo na sa bhavaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_31: yā ca śūnyā na sā jātir notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_32: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jāter anutpādo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_34: yac ca śūnyaṃ na taj jarāmaraṇaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:146_35: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jarāmaraṇasyānutpādo na taj jarāmaraṇam.
S06sspp2_2u:147_1: yā ca śūnyā na sā dānapāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:147_2: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:147_4: yā ca śūnyā na sā śīlapāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:147_5: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā (ŚsP II-2 35) anutpādo na sā śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:147_7: yā ca śūnyā na sā kṣāntipāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:147_8: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:147_10: yā ca śūnyā na sā vīryapāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:147_11: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vīryapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:147_13: yā ca śūnyā na sā dhyānapāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:147_14: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:147_16: yā ca śūnyā na sā prajñāpāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:147_17: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_2u:148_1: yā ca śūnyā na sādhyātmaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_2: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:148_4: yā ca śūnyā na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_5: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:148_7: yā ca śūnyā na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_8: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:148_10: yā ca śūnyā na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_11: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:148_13: yā ca śūnyā na sā mahāśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_14: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo mahāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:148_16: yā ca śūnyā na sā paramārthaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_17: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:148_19: yā ca śūnyā na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_20: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:148_22: yā ca śūnyā na sātyantaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_23: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'tyantaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sātyantaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:148_25: yā ca śūnyā na sānavarāgraśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_26: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'navarāgraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavarāgraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:148_28: yā ca śūnyā na sānavakāraśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_29: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'navakāraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavakāraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:148_31: yā ca śūnyā na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_32: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:148_34: yā ca śūnyā na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_35: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:148_37: yā ca śūnyā na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_38: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:148_40: yā ca śūnyā na sānupalambhaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_41: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'nupalambhaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānupalambhaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:148_43: yā ca śūnyā na sābhāvaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_44: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:148_46: yā ca śūnyā na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_47: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:148_49: yā ca śūnyā na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:148_50: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_2u:149_0: smṛtyupasthānāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāni smṛtyupasthānaṃ yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_1: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06sspp2_2u:149_2: samyakprahāṇāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāni (ŚsP II-2 37) samyakprahāṇair yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni samyakprahāṇāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_3: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ samyakprahāṇānām anutpādo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
S06sspp2_2u:149_4: ṛddhipādā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā ṛddhipādair yā ca śūnyā na te ṛddhipādā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_5: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ṛddhipādānām anutpādo na te ṛddhipādāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_6: indriyāṇi āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyānīndriyair yāni ca śūnyāni na tānīndriyāṇi notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_7: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya indriyāṇām anutpādo na tānīndriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_2u:149_8: balāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāni balair yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni balāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_9: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo balānām anutpādo na tāni balāni,
S06sspp2_2u:149_10: bodhyaṅgāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāni bodhyaṅgair yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni bodhyaṅgāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_11: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo bodhyaṅgānām anutpādo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
S06sspp2_2u:149_12: āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnya āryāṣṭāṅgamārgena yaś ca śūnyo na sa mārgo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_13: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasyānutpādo na sa mārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_15: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāny āryasatyāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_16: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya āryasatyānām anutpādo na tāny āryasatyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:149_18: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāny dhyānāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_19: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dhyānānām anutpādo na tāny dhyānāni,
S06sspp2_2u:149_21: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāny apramāṇāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_22: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo pramāṇānām anutpādo na tāny apramāṇāni,
S06sspp2_2u:149_24: yāś ca śūnyā na tā ārūpyasamāpattayo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_25: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ārūpyasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_27: ye ca śūnyā na te vimokṣā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_28: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vimokṣāṇām anutpādo na te vimokṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_30: yāś ca śūnyā na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_31: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'nupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_33: (ŚsP II-2 38) yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_34: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anutpādo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
S06sspp2_2u:149_36: yāś ca śūnyā na tā abhijñā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_37: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bhijñāyā anutpādo na tā abhijñāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_39: ye ca śūnyā na te samādhayo notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhayaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_41: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_42: anena āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06sspp2_2u:149_44: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni tathāgatabalāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_45: anena āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ tathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni tathāgatabalāni,
S06sspp2_2u:149_47: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni vaiśāradyāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_48: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vaiśāradyānām anutpādo na tāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvida āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_49: yāś ca śūnyā na tā pratisaṃvido notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_50: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tā pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_52: yā ca śūnyā na sā mahāmaitrī notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:149_53: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sā mahāmaitrī,
S06sspp2_2u:149_55: yā ca śūnyā na sā mahākaruṇā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā mahākaruṇā,
S06sspp2_2u:149_57: ye ca śūnyā na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:150_1: yā ca śūnyā na sā sarvajñatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:150_2: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_2u:150_4: yā ca śūnyā na sā mārgākārajñatā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo (ŚsP II-2 39) na sā mārgākārajñatā,

S06sspp2_2u:151_0: āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi? yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,

S06sspp2_2u:151_4: yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam.
S06sspp2_2u:152_0: yaś cakṣuṣo vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:152_1: yaḥ śrotrasya vyayo na tac chrotraṃ,

S06sspp2_2u:152_4: yaḥ kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:152_5: yo manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ.

S06sspp2_2u:208_14: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate mahāśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:208_17: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate paramārthaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:208_20: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate saṃskṛtaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:208_23: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:208_26: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate 'tyantaśūnyatā advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:208_29: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate anavarāgraśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:208_32: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate 'navakāraśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:208_35: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate prakṛtiśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:208_38: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate sarvadharmaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:208_41: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate svalakṣaṇaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:208_44: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate 'nupalambhaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:208_47: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate 'bhāvaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:208_50: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate svabhāvaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:208_53: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
S06sspp2_2u:209_2: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyante smṛtyupasthānānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_5: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyante samyakprahāṇānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_8: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ima ucyante ṛddhipādā ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_11: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyante indriyāṇīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_14: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyante balānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_17: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyante bodhyaṅgānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_20: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'yam ucyata āryāṣṭāṅgamārga ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_23: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyanta āryasatyānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_26: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyante dhyānānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_27: (ŚsP II-2 57) tathā hi nānyāny apramāṇāny anyo 'nutpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:209_29: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyante pramāṇānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_32: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad ima ucyante ārūpyasamāpattaya ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_35: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ima ucyante vimokṣā ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_38: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya imā ucyante 'nupūrvavihārasamāpattaya ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_41: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad imāny ucyante śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_44: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yā imā ucyante abhijñā ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_47: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya imā ucyante samādhaya ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_50: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yānīmāny ucyante dhāraṇīmukhānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_53: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yānīmāny ucyante tathāgatabalānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_56: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yānīmāny ucyante vaiśāradyānīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_59: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya imā ucyante pratisaṃvida ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_61: anutpāda eva mahāmaitrī mahāmaitry (ŚsP II-2 58) evānutpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:209_62: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate mahāmaitrīty advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:209_65: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate mahākaruṇety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:210_0: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya imā ucyante āveṇikabuddhadharmā ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
S06sspp2_2u:211_2: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad etad ucyate śrotraāpattiphalam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:211_5: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad etad ucyate sakṛdāgāmiphalam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:211_8: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad etad ucyate 'nāgāmiphalam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:211_11: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad etad ucyate 'rhattvam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:211_14: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'yam ucyate pratyekabodhir ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:211_17: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate sarvajñatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:211_20: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate mārgākārajñatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_2u:212_0: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yeyam ucyate sarvākārajñatety advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
S06sspp2_2u:213_2: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahasattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān evam upaparīkṣate,
S06sspp2_2u:213_3: tasmin samaye bhagavan rūpasyānutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06sspp2_2u:218_4: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā (ŚsP II-2 60) anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06sspp2_2u:222_10: anavakāraśūnyatāyā (ŚsP II-2 61) anutpādaṃ paśyaty atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
S06sspp2_2u:227_0: athāyuṣmāñ chāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:228_0: rūpam anutpādaḥ, vedanām anutpādaḥ, saṃjñām anutpādaḥ, saṃskārā anutpādaḥ, vijñānam anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:237_1: śūnyatāśūnyatānutpādaḥ, mahāśūnyatānutpādaḥ, paramārthaśūnyatānutpādaḥ, saṃskṛtaśūnyatānutpādaḥ, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatānutpādaḥ, atyantaśūnyatānutpādaḥ, anavarāgraśūnyatānutpādaḥ, anavakāraśūnyatānutpādaḥ, prakṛtiśūnyatānutpādaḥ, sarvadharmaśūnyatānutpādaḥ, svalakṣaṇaśūnyatānutpādaḥ, anupalambhaśūnyatānutpādaḥ, abhāvaśūnyatānutpādaḥ, svabhāvaśūnyatānutpādaḥ, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatānutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:238_0: smṛtyupasthānāny anutpādaḥ, samyakprahāṇāny anutpādaḥ, ṛddhipādā anutpādaḥ, indriyāṇy anutpādaḥ, balāny anutpādaḥ, bodhyaṅgāny anutpādaḥ, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'nutpādaḥ, āryasatyāny anutpādaḥ, catvāri dhyānāny anutpādaḥ, catvāry apramāṇāny anutpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:239_1: abhijñā anutpādaḥ, samādhayo 'nutpādaḥ, dhāraṇīmukhāny anutpādaḥ, daśatathāgatabalāny anutpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:240_0: pṛthagjano 'nutpādaḥ, pṛthagjanadharmā anutpādaḥ, srotaāpanno 'nutpādaḥ, srotaāpannadharmā anutpādaḥ, sakṛdāgāmino 'nutpādaḥ, sakṛdāgāmidharmā anutpādaḥ, anāgāmino 'nutpādaḥ, anāgāmidharmā anutpādaḥ, (ŚsP II-2 64) arhattvam anutpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:241_0: cakṣur anutpādaḥ śrotram anutpādo ghrāṇam anutpādo jihvānutpādaḥ kāyo 'nutpādo mano 'nutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:242_0: rūpam anutpādaḥ śabdo 'nutpādo gandho 'nutpādo raso 'nutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo dharmā anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:242_1: cakṣurvijñānam anutpādaḥ, śrotravijñānam anutpādo ghrāṇavijñānam anutpādo jihvāvijñānam anutpādaḥ kāyavijñānam anutpādo manovijñānam anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:243_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo jihvāsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo manaḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:244_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:245_0: pṛthivīdhātur anutpādo 'bdhātur anutpādaḥ tejodhātur anutpādo vāyudhātur anutpāda ākāśadhātur anutpādo vijñānadhātur anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:246_0: avidyānutpādaḥ saṃskārā anutpādo vijñānam anutpādo nāmarūpam anutpādaḥ ṣaḍāyatanam anutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo vedanānutpādaḥ tṛṣṇānutpāda upādānam anutpādo bhavo 'nutpādo jātir anutpādo jarāmaraṇam anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:247_0: dānapāramitānutpādaḥ śīlapāramitānutpādaḥ kṣāntipāramitānutpādo vīryapāramitānutpādo dhyānapāramitānutpādaḥ prajñāpāramitānutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:248_0: adhyātmaśūnyatānutpādo bahirdhāśūnyatānutpādo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatānutpādaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatānutpādo mahāśūnyatānutpādaḥ paramārthaśūnyatānutpādaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatānutpādo 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatānutpādo 'tyantaśūnyatānutpādo 'navarāgraśūnyatānutpādo 'navakāraśūnyatānutpādaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatānutpādaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatānutpādaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatānutpādo 'nupalambhaśūnyatānutpādo (ŚsP II-2 65) 'bhāvaśūnyatānutpādaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatānutpādo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatānutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:249_0: smṛtyupasthānāny anutpādaḥ samyakprahāṇāny anutpāda ṛddhipādā anutpādaḥ indriyāṇy anutpādo balāny anutpādo bodhyaṅgāny anutpāda āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'nutpāda āryasatyāny anutpādaś catvāri dhyānāny anutpādaś catvāry apramāṇāny anutpāda catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo 'nutpādo aṣṭau vimokṣānutpādo navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo 'nutpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:250_1: samādhayo 'nutpādo dhāraṇīmukhāny anutpādaḥ daśatathāgatabalāny anutpādaś catvāri vaiśāradyāny anutpādaś catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nutpādo mahāmaitry anutpādo mahākaruṇānutpādo 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:251_0: pṛthagjano 'nutpādaḥ, pṛthagjanadharmā anutpādaḥ, srotaāpanno 'nutpādaḥ, srotaāpannadharmā anutpādaḥ, sakṛdāgāmino 'nutpādaḥ, sakṛdāgāmidharmā anutpādaḥ, anāgāmino 'nutpādaḥ, anāgāmidharmā anutpādaḥ, arhattvam anutpādaḥ, arhaddharmā anutpādaḥ, pratyekabuddho 'nutpādaḥ, pratyekabuddhadharmā anutpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:251_1: bodhisattvo 'nutpādaḥ, bodhisattvadharmā anutpādaḥ, buddho 'py anutpādaḥ, buddhadharmā apy anutpādaḥ. tat prāptam eva bhavati śrāvakayāṇikaiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāptaiva bhavati,
S06sspp2_2u:251_3: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatā pañcānāṃ gatīnāṃ bhede na bhaviṣyati prāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahasattvena pañcavidhā bodhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:252_1: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ srotaāpannena trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvitaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:252_3: anāgāminā pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvitaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:252_4: arhatā pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvitaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:252_5: pratyekabuddhayānikaiḥ pratyekabodhaye mārgo bhāvitaḥ? kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkaracaryāñ carati yad duḥkhāni sattvānāṃ kṛtane pratyanubhavati? kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
S06sspp2_2u:253_1: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:253_2: nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpādasya dharmasya prāptim icchāmi na samayaṃ cānutpādasya srotaāpattitvam icchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:253_4: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānutpādasyānāgāmitvam icchāmi nānāgāmiphalaṃ nānutpādasyārhattvam icchāmi nārhattvasākṣātkriyāṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:253_5: nānutpādasya pratyekabuddhatvam icchāmi na pratyekabodhir nāpy aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrecchāmi yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkaracaryāṃ caran nāpi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkarasaṃjñayā carati.
S06sspp2_2u:253_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ janayitvāśakyam aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām arthaṃ kartum api tv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sarvattveyumātṛsaṃjñā janayitvā pitṛsaṃjñāṃ janayitvā putrasaṃjñā janayitvāsakyam aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām arthakartun tac cānupalambhayogena evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:253_7: yathātmātmeti cocyate sa ca sarveṇa sarvathā sarvaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_2u:254_1: saced evaṃ saṃjñām utpādayitavyeti duṣkarasaṃjñām utpadayiṣyati.
S06sspp2_2u:254_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na sa kaccit tad dharmam utpādayati nopalabhyate nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpāde tathāgatam icchāmi nānuttarā saṃyaksaṃbodhir yathā tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ na hy anutpannena dharmeṇa prāptiḥ prāpyate.
S06sspp2_2u:255_0: āha: kim punas tvam āyuṣman subhūte utpannena dharmeṇa prāptim icchasi? athānutpannena dharmeṇa prāpyamāṇam?
S06sspp2_2u:256_0: subhūtir āha: nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpānnena dharmeṇa prāptim icchāmi nāpy anutpannena dharmeṇa prāpyamāṇām.
S06sspp2_2u:257_0: āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte nāsti prāptir nāsty abhisamayaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:258_0: subhūtir āha: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prāptir asty abhisamayo na punaḥ paramārthena dharmeṇa.
S06sspp2_2u:259_0: api tu khalu punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra lokavyavahāreṇa prāptir abhisamayo vā prajñāpyate lokavyavahāreṇa srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmī vā nāgāmī vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā prajñayate.
S06sspp2_2u:259_1: na punaḥ paramārthena prāptir vābhisamayo vā srotaāpanno vā (ŚsP II-2 67) sakṛdāgāmī vānāgāmī vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā buddho vā prajñapyate.
S06sspp2_2u:260_0: āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca tathaiva pañcānāṃ gatīnāṃ lokavyavahāreṇa bhedo na punaḥ paramārthena?
S06sspp2_2u:261_0: āha: evam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca tathaiva pañcānāṃ gatīnāṃ lokavyavahāreṇa bhedo na punaḥ paramārthena.

S06sspp2_2u:263_0: subhūtir āha: nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya dharmasyotpādam icchāmi.

S06sspp2_2u:290_11: vimokṣāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:290_12: anupūrvavihārasamāpattinām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:291_0: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:291_1: abhijñānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:291_2: samādhīnām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,

S06sspp2_2u:292_1: tathāgatabalānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:292_2: vaiśāradyānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:292_3: pratisaṃvidām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,

S06sspp2_2u:292_5: mahākaruṇāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:292_6: āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:293_0: srotaāpattiphalasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:293_4: pratyekabodher aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:294_0: sarvajñatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:294_1: mārgākārajñatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:294_2: sarvākārajñatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi.
S06sspp2_2u:295_0: śāradvatīputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte utpāda utpadyate? athānutpāda utpadyate?
S06sspp2_2u:296_0: āha: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpāda utpadyate,
S06sspp2_2u:296_1: nānutpāda utpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yaś cotpādo yaś cānutpāda ubhāv etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktāv arūpiṇāv anidarśanāv apratighāv ekalakṣaṇo yad utālakṣaṇaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:296_2: tad anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa notpāda utpadyate,
S06sspp2_2u:297_0: śāradvatīputra āha: anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti te mantrayitum,
S06sspp2_2u:297_1: anutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādo hy āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06sspp2_2u:298_0: subhūtir āha: anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣmañ (ŚsP II-2 77) chāradvatīputra yac ca pratibhāti te mantrayitum iti,
S06sspp2_2u:298_1: anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra na me pratibhāti mantrayitum,
S06sspp2_2u:298_2: anutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādo 'pi me āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra na pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06sspp2_2u:298_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yaś cānutpanno dharmo yaś cānutpādo yac ca pratibhānaṃ ye ca mantrā yā cānutpattiḥ sarvadharmā ete na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā avijñaptikā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:299_0: āha: anutpāda ity āyuṣman subhūte mantraḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:299_1: anutpādaṃ pratibhānaṃ, anutpādo dharmaḥ, te 'pi dharmā anutpādā yāṃs tān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06sspp2_2u:300_0: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra anutpādo mantro 'nutpādaḥ pratibhāno 'nutpādo dharmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:300_1: te 'pi dharmā anutpādā yāṃs tān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06sspp2_2u:300_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpam anutpādo vedanānutpādaḥ saṃjñānutpādaḥ saṃskārānutpādo vijñānam anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:301_0: cakṣur anutpādaḥ śrotram anutpādo ghrāṇam anutpādo jihvānutpādaḥ kāyo 'nutpādo mano 'nutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:302_0: rūpam anutpādaḥ śabdo 'nutpādo gandho 'nutpādo raso 'nutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo dharmā anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:303_0: cakṣurvijñānam anutpādaḥ, śrotravijñānam anutpādo ghrāṇavijñānam anutpādo jihvāvijñānam anutpādaḥ kāyavijñānam anutpādo manovijñānam anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:304_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo jihvāsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo manaḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:305_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanānutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:306_0: pṛthivīdhātur anutpādo 'bdhātur anutpādaḥ tejodhātur anutpādo vāyudhātur anutpāda ākāśadhātur anutpādo vijñānadhātur anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:307_1: avidyānutpādaḥ saṃskārā anutpādo vijñānam anutpādo nāmarūpam anutpādaḥ ṣaḍāyatanam anutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo vedanānutpādaḥ tṛṣṇānutpāda upādānam anutpādo bhavo 'nutpādo jātir anutpādo jarāmaraṇam anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:308_0: dānapāramitānutpādaḥ śīlapāramitānutpādaḥ kṣāntipāramitānutpādo vīryapāramitānutpādo dhyānapāramitānutpādaḥ prajñāpāramitānutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:309_0: adhyātmaśūnyatānutpādo bahirdhāśūnyatānutpādo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatānutpādaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatānutpādo mahāśūnyatānutpādaḥ paramārthaśūnyatānutpādaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatānutpādo 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatānutpādo 'tyantaśūnyatānutpādo 'navarāgraśūnyatānutpādo 'navakāraśūnyatānutpādaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatānutpādaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatānutpādaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatānutpādo 'nupalambhaśūnyatānutpādo 'bhāvaśūnyatānutpādaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatānutpādo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatānutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:310_0: smṛtyupasthānāny anutpādaḥ samyakprahāṇāny anutpāda ṛddhipādā anutpādaḥ indriyāṇy anutpādo balāny anutpādo bodhyaṅgāny anutpāda āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'nutpāda āryasatyāny anutpādo dhyānāny anutpādo 'pramāṇāny anutpāda ārūpyasamāpattayo 'nutpādo vimokṣānutpādo 'nupūrvavihārasamāpattayo 'nutpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:311_1: samādhayo 'nutpādo dhāraṇīmukhāny anutpādaḥ tathāgatabalāny anutpādo vaiśāradyāny anutpādaḥ pratisaṃvido 'nutpādo mahāmaitry anutpādo mahākaruṇānutpāda āveṇikabuddhadharmā anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:312_0: srotaāpattiphalam anutpādaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anutpādo 'nāgāmiphalam anutpādo 'rhattvam anutpādaḥ pratyekabodhir anutpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:313_0: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇānutpādo mantro 'nutpādaṃ pratibhānam anutpādo dharmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:313_1: te 'pi dharmā anutpādā yāṃs tān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06sspp2_2u:314_0: āha: dharmakathikānām agratāyām ayam āyuṣman subhūtiḥ sthāpayitavyaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:314_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūtiḥ sthaviro yato yata eva paripṛcchyate tatas tata eva niḥsarati.
S06sspp2_2u:315_0: subhūtir āha: dharmataiṣāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakānām aniśritānāṃ sarvadharmeṣu te yato yata eva paripṛcchyante (ŚsP II-2 79) tatas tata eva niḥsaranti.
S06sspp2_2u:315_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? yathāpi tad aniśritatvāt sarvadharmāṇām.
S06sspp2_2u:317_0: subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:317_1: vedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:317_2: saṃjñāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:317_3: saṃskārā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antreṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:317_4: vijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_2u:318_0: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na
S06sspp2_2u:318_2: śrotram āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:318_3: ghrāṇam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:318_4: jihvāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:318_5: kāya āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:318_6: mana āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_2u:319_0: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:319_1: śabda āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:319_2: gandha āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:319_3: rasa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:319_4: sparśa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito (ŚsP II-2 80) nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:319_5: dharmā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_2u:320_0: cakṣurvijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:320_1: śrotravijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:320_2: ghrāṇavijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:320_3: jihvāvijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:320_4: kāyavijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:320_5: manovijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_2u:321_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:321_1: śrotrasaṃsparśa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:321_2: ghrāṇasaṃsparśa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:321_3: jihvāsaṃsparśa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,

S06sspp2_2u:322_1: śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:322_2: ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:322_3: jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:322_4: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyuṣmañ (ŚsP II-2 81) chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:322_5: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.

S06sspp2_2u:323_1: abdhātur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,

S06sspp2_2u:323_5: vijñānadhātur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antar eṇopalabhy ate.

S06sspp2_2u:325_1: śīlapāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:325_2: kṣāntipāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
