S06sspp2_2u:325_5: prajñāpāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_2u:326_0: adhyātmaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_1: bahirdhāśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_2: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_3: śūnyatāśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_4: mahāśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_5: paramārthaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_6: saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_7: asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_8: atyantaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_9: anavarāgraśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_10: anavakāraśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_11: prakṛtiśūnyatāyuṣman chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā (ŚsP II-2 83) nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_12: sarvadharmaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_13: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_14: anupalambhaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_15: abhāvaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_16: svabhāvaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:326_17: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_2u:327_0: smṛtyupasthānāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_1: samyakprahāṇāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_2: ṛddhipādā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_3: indriyāṇy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_4: balāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_5: bodhyaṅgāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_6: āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaḥ sa nādhyātmaniśrito na bahirdhāniśrito nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_7: āryasatyāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_8: dhyānāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_9: apramāṇāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_10: ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās tā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_11: vimokṣā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_12: anupūrvavihārasamāpattaya āyuṣmañ (ŚsP II-2 84) chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās tā nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_13: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_14: abhijñā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās tā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_15: samādhaya āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_16: dhāraṇīmukhāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_17: tathāgatabalāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_18: vaiśāradyāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyāni tāni nādhyātmaniśritāni na bahirdhāniśritāni nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_19: pratisaṃvida āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās tā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_20: mahāmaitry āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_21: mahākaruṇāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:327_22: āveṇikabuddhadharmā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_2u:328_0: srotaāpattiphalam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:328_1: sakṛdāgāmiphalam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:328_2: anāgāmiphalam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:328_3: arhattvam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:328_4: pratyekabodhir āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:328_5: sarvajñatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:328_6: mārgākārajñatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:328_7: sarvākārajñatāyuṣmañ (ŚsP II-2 85) chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_2u:329_0: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā aniśritāḥ prakṛtiśūnyām upādāya.
S06sspp2_2u:330_0: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā rūpaṃ pariśodhayitavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:336_0: pṛthivīdhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyo 'bdhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyaḥ tejodhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyo vāyudhātuḥ pariśodhayitavya ākāśadhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyo vijñānadhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:337_0: avidyā pariśodhayitavyā, saṃskārāḥ pariśodhayitavyāḥ, vijñānaṃ pariśodhayitavyaṃ, nāmarūpaṃ pariśodhayitavyaṃ, ṣaḍāyatanaṃ pariśodhayitavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:340_11: abhijñāḥ pariśodhayitavāḥ, samādhayaḥ pariśodhayitavāḥ, dhāraṇīmukhāni pariśodhayitavyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:340_15: mahāmaitrī pariśodhayitavyā, mahākaruṇā pariśodhayitavyā, āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ pariśodhayitavyāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:341_0: athāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra punar āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:341_1: katham āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārgaṃ pariśodhayati?
S06sspp2_2u:342_0: subhūtir āha: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānapāramitā laukiky asti (ŚsP II-2 87) lokottarāsti,
S06sspp2_2u:343_0: āha: katamāyuṣman subhūte dānapāramitā laukikī katamā lokottarā?
S06sspp2_2u:344_0: subhūtir āha: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dātā bhavati dānapatiḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakāyācanakebhyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:344_1: annam annārthikebhyaḥ pānaṃ pānārthikebhyo yānaṃ yānārthikebhyo vastraṃ vastrārthikebhyaḥ puṣpaṃ puṣpārthikebhyo mālyaṃ mālyārthikebhyo gandhaṃ gandhārthikebhyo vilepanaṃ vilepanārthikebhya upāśrayam upāśrayārthikebhya śayyāsanaṃ śayyāsanārthikebhya upakaraṇam upakaraṇārthikebhyo bhaiṣajyaṃ bhaiṣajyārthikebhyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:344_2: yāvad anyatarānyatarā mānuṣyakāpariṣkārān dadāti putrārthikebhyaḥ putraṃ dadāti duhitṛkārthikebhyo duhitṛn dadāti bhāryārthikebhyo bhāryāṃ dadāti rājyārthikebhyo rājyaṃ dadāti,
S06sspp2_2u:344_7: tac ca saṃniśritaḥ parityajati tasyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06sspp2_2u:344_9: idaṃ dānam ahaṃ dātā, ahaṃ dānapatir ahaṃ sarvāstiparityāgī,
S06sspp2_2u:344_10: ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomi, ahaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carāmi, tac ca dānaṃ datvopalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me dānaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharme sukhitā bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti,
S06sspp2_2u:344_11: sa triṣu saṃyogeṣu saktas tad dānaṃ dadāti,
S06sspp2_2u:344_12: katameṣu triṣu? yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ dānasaṃjñāyām eṣu triṣu saṃyogeṣu sakto dānaṃ dadāti.
S06sspp2_2u:344_14: kena kāraṇenocyate laukikī dānapāramiteti? tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati,
S06sspp2_2u:344_15: na ca saṃkrāmati tenocyate laukikī dānapāramitā.
S06sspp2_2u:345_0: tatra katamā lokottarā dānapāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:347_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvas tad dānaṃ dadann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate pratigrāhakaṃ nopalabhyate dānaṃ nopalabhyate vipākañ (ŚsP II-2 88) ca nābhinandati.
S06sspp2_2u:347_1: iyam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:348_0: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānaṃ dadāti sarvasattvebhyaś ca tad dānaṃ niryātayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:348_1: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati.
S06sspp2_2u:348_2: iyam ucyate āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra lokottarā dānapāramitā.
S06sspp2_2u:348_3: kena kāraṇenocyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti? tathā hi lokottareti lokā carati saṃkrāmati tenocyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti.
S06sspp2_2u:349_0: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śīlapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
S06sspp2_2u:351_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ śīlaṃ rakṣati tac ca saṃniśrito bhavati tasyaivaṃ bhavaty aham śīlaṃ rakṣāmi sattvānām arthāya.
S06sspp2_2u:351_1: idam śīlam ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomi tac ca śīlaṃ rakṣann upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me śīlaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmeṣu sukhino bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti.
S06sspp2_2u:351_2: sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tac chīlaṃ rakṣati yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ śīlasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī śīlapāramiteti.
S06sspp2_2u:351_3: tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
S06sspp2_2u:352_0: tatra katamā lokottarā śīlapāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:354_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ śīlaṃ rakṣann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate śīlaṃ nopalabhyate vipākaṃ nābhinandati sarvasattvebhyaś ca tac chīlaṃ niryātayati.
S06sspp2_2u:354_1: tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittaṃ na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā śīlapāramitā tathā hi lokā carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
S06sspp2_2u:355_0: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra kṣāntipāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
S06sspp2_2u:357_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati,
S06sspp2_2u:357_1: tāñ ca saṃniśrito bhavati, tasyaivaṃ bhavatv ahaṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayāmi sarvasattvānām arthāya,
S06sspp2_2u:357_2: iyaṃ kṣāntir ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karoti tañ ca kṣāntiṃ bhāvayann upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ (ŚsP II-2 89) sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayate,
S06sspp2_2u:357_3: anena me kṣāntiphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti.
S06sspp2_2u:357_4: sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tā kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ kṣāntisaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī kṣāntipāramiteti.
S06sspp2_2u:357_5: tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
S06sspp2_2u:358_0: tatra katamā lokottarā kṣāntipāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:360_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate kṣāntiṃ nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:360_1: vipākaṃ nābhinandati, sarvasattvebhyaś ca tāṃ kṣāntiṃ niryātayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:360_2: 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati.
S06sspp2_2u:360_4: tathā hi lokāc carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
S06sspp2_2u:361_0: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vīryapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
S06sspp2_2u:363_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo vīryam ārabhate,
S06sspp2_2u:363_1: tac ca saṃniśrita ārabhate tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ vīryam ārabhate sarvasattvānām arthāya,
S06sspp2_2u:363_2: ayaṃ kāya idaṃ cittam idaṃ vīryam ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomy ahaṃ vīryapāramitāyāñ carāmi tac ca vīryam upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarayāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati,
S06sspp2_2u:363_3: anena me vīryaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavatv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti.
S06sspp2_2u:363_4: sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas taṃ vīryam ārabhate,
S06sspp2_2u:363_5: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ vīryasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī vīryapāramiteti.
S06sspp2_2u:363_6: tathā hi kokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
S06sspp2_2u:364_0: tatra katamā lokottarā vīryapāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:366_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo vīryam ārabhamāṇa ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate vīryaṃ nopalabhyate vipākaṃ ca nābhinandati sarvasattvebhyaś ca tad vīryaṃ niryatayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhate nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayañ cāpi ca nimittam na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā vīryapāramitā tathā hi (ŚsP II-2 90) lokāc carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
S06sspp2_2u:367_0: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dhyānapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
S06sspp2_2u:369_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06sspp2_2u:369_1: tac ca saṃniśritaḥ samāpadyate tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānāni samāpadyate sarvasattvānām arthāya,
S06sspp2_2u:369_2: imāni dhyānāni, ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomi tac ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyamāna upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me dhyānaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti,
S06sspp2_2u:369_3: sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06sspp2_2u:369_4: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ dhyānasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī dhyānapāramiteti,
S06sspp2_2u:369_5: tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati,
S06sspp2_2u:370_0: tatra katamā lokottarā dhyānapāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:372_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo dhyānāni samāpadyamāna ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate vipākaṃ ca nābhinandati,
S06sspp2_2u:372_2: tāś ca sattvān nopalabhyate, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittan na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā dhyānapāramitā tathā hi lokāc carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
S06sspp2_2u:373_0: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
S06sspp2_2u:375_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
S06sspp2_2u:375_1: tāñ ca saṃniśrito bhāvayati sarvapāpaṃ pratideśayati,
S06sspp2_2u:375_2: ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ cārthāya sarvapuṇyam anumodyate sarvabuddhān adhyeṣate upalambhayogena tac ca sarvakuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupāyena tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayāmi sarvasattvānām arthāya iyaṃ prajñā imāṃ buddhājñāṃ karomi.
S06sspp2_2u:375_3: tāṃ ca prajñāṃ bhāvayann upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati anena me prajñāphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharme sukhino bhavantv anutpādāya ca parinirvāntv iti,
S06sspp2_2u:375_4: sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayanti,
S06sspp2_2u:375_5: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ prajñāsaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī (ŚsP II-2 91) prajñāpāramitā tathā hi lokān na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
S06sspp2_2u:376_0: tatra katamā lokottarā prajñāpāramitā? yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:378_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate prajñān nopalabhyate vipākaś ca nābhinandati,
S06sspp2_2u:378_3: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittan na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā prajñāpāramitā tathā hi lokāc caraty uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottarā prajñāpāramiteti.
S06sspp2_2u:379_0: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārgaṃ pariśodhayati.
S06sspp2_2u:380_0: āha: katamāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:381_0: subhūtir āha: dānapāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:383_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:384_0: catvāry āryasatyāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:385_0: daśatathāgatabalāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:385_5: aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:386_0: āha: sādhu sādhv āyuṣman subhūte katamasyā ayaṃ pāramitāyāḥ puruṣakāraḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:387_0: subhūtir āha: prajñāpāramitāyā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāyaṃ puruṣakāraḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:387_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā (ŚsP II-2 93) janayitrī sarvakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ prajñāpāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra parigrāhikā saṃgrāhikā sarvakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra caritaiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:387_2: anāgatā apy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tathāgatārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā atraiva prajñāpāramitāyāñ caritvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06sspp2_2u:387_3: ye 'pi te āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhrīyante yāpayanti,
S06sspp2_2u:388_0: sacet punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhanvāyitatvaṃ vā veditavyam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra viharaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena vihāreṇa yad uta sarvasattvānāṃ trāṇāya sarvasattvānām aparityāgatāyai tac cānupalambhayogena viharaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena manasikāreṇa yad uta mahākaruṇā manasikārena.
S06sspp2_2u:389_0: āha: viharatum āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'yam anena vihāreṇecchasi,
S06sspp2_2u:389_1: avirahitaṃ cānena manasikāreṇa yad uta mahākaruṇā manasikāreṇa,
S06sspp2_2u:389_2: evaṃ saty āyuṣman subhūte sarvasattvā bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_2u:389_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? sarvasattvā hy āyuṣman subhūte 'virahitā manasikārena.
S06sspp2_2u:390_0: subhūtir āha: sādhu sādhv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra upālapsye upālapsya iti.
S06sspp2_2u:390_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? sattvāsattayāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra manasikārāsattā veditavyā sattvābhāvatayā manasikārābhāvatā veditavyā sattvāsvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:497_0: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahita eva tena manasikāreṇa veditavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:498_0: atha bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāram adāt:
S06sspp2_2u:498_1: sādhu sādhu subhūte, evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitopadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:498_2: yathā tvam upadiśasi yathāpi taṃ tathāgatasyānubhāvena evaṃ ca punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:498_3: yathā tvam upadiśasi. asmin khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitā parivartā.
S06sspp2_2u:499_0: āyuṣmatā subhūtinā bhāṣyamāne ayam trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍ vikāram akaṃpat prākaṃpat saṃprākaṃpat,
S06sspp2_2u:499_2: acarat prācarat saṃprācarat, akṣubhyat (ŚsP II-2 112) prākṣubhyat saṃprākṣubhyat,
S06sspp2_2u:500_0: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādur akārṣīt.
S06sspp2_2u:501_0: athāyuṣmāṃ subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasyāviṣkaraṇe?
S06sspp2_2u:502_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:502_1: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva pūrvasyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣante,
S06sspp2_2u:503_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣante,
S06sspp2_2u:504_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva paścimāyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣante.
S06sspp2_2u:505_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivottarāyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣante.
S06sspp2_2u:506_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivottarapūrvasyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣante.
S06sspp2_2u:507_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ (ŚsP II-2 113) mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣante.
S06sspp2_2u:508_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣante.
S06sspp2_2u:509_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva paścimottarasyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣante.
S06sspp2_2u:510_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivādhastād diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣante.
S06sspp2_2u:511_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivopariṣṭād diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣante.
S06sspp2_2u:512_0: yasmin khalu punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitānirdeśe bhāṣyamāṇe dvādaśānām ayutānāṃ devamāṇuṣyakānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntir utpannā,
S06sspp2_2u:512_1: teṣām api samantād daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānām asaṃkhyeyānām aprameyānāṃ sattvānām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni.
S06sspp2_2u:514_1: atha khalu yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahārājānas te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasāhasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:514_2: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śakrā devendrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:514_3: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau suyāmā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:514_4: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau saṃtuṣitā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:514_5: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau nirmitā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:514_6: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau vaśavartinā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:514_7: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahābrahmāṇas te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:514_8: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ābhāsvarā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:514_9: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śubhakṛtsnā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:514_10: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau bṛhatphalā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:514_11: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:514_12: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau yaś ca teṣāṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:514_13: yaś ca teṣāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:514_14: yaś ca teṣāṃ yāmānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:514_15: yaś ca teṣāṃ tuṣitānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:514_16: yaś ca teṣāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:514_17: yaś ca teṣāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:514_18: yaś ca teṣāṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:514_19: yaś ca teṣām (ŚsP II-2 115) ābhāsvarāṇām devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:514_20: yaś ca teṣām śubhakṛtsnānām devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:514_21: yaś ca teṣāṃ bṛhatphalānāṃ devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:514_22: yaś ca teṣāṃ śuddhāvāsakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:514_23: sa tathāgatasya prakṛtyavabhāsasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06sspp2_2u:514_27: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api na kṣamate,
S06sspp2_2u:514_28: tathāgatasya prakṛtyā ābhāyāḥ purataḥ sarvās tā devānāṃ karmavipākajā ābhā na bhāsante na tapanti na virocante,
S06sspp2_2u:514_29: tathāgatasyaiṣābhā sāgrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate viśiṣṭākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāte praṇītākhyāyate anuttarākhyāyate niruttarākhyāyate.
S06sspp2_2u:515_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:515_1: ete bhadanta subhūte yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ trayastriṃśā devā yāmā devā tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmakāyikā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhatphalā devāḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā devās te sarve saṃnipatitā bhadanta subhūte dharmaśravaṇāya prajñāpāramitopadeśaṃ śrotukāmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:516_0: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam?
S06sspp2_2u:518_0: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāraitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam?
S06sspp2_2u:519_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakram devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:519_1: tena hi kauśika śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikurūpadeśyāmi buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena ca bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ yathā ca śikṣitavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:519_2: yaiś ca devaputrair anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittaṃ notpāditam,
S06sspp2_2u:519_3: tair apy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpādayitavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:519_5: te pratibalā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpādayitum.
S06sspp2_2u:521_0: api tu khalu punas teṣām apy anumode saced anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhyaye cittam utpādayati,
S06sspp2_2u:521_1: nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kuśalapakṣasyāntarāyaṃ karomi viśiṣṭebhyo hi dharmebhyo viśiṣṭatamā dharmā adhyālambitavyaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:522_0: tatra katamā kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā?
S06sspp2_2u:523_0: iha kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittotpādena,
S06sspp2_2u:531_2: jihvānātmato manasikartavyā, (ŚsP II-2 119) jihvā śāntato manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:531_4: jihvā rogato manasikartavyā, jihvā gaṇḍato manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:531_6: jihvāghato manasikartavyā, jihvābādhato manasikartavyā, jihvā parato manasikartavyā, jihvā pralopadharmato manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:531_7: jihvā calato manasikartavyā, jihvā prabhaṅgulato manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:532_6: kāyo rogato manasikartavyaḥ, kāyo gaṇḍato manasikartavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:533_6: mano rogato manasikartavyaṃ, mano gaṇḍato manasikartavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:571_4: tṛṣṇā rogato manasikartavyā, tṛsṇā gaṇḍato manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:571_6: tṛṣṇāghato manasikartavyā, tṛṣṇābādhato manasikartavyā, tṛṣṇā parato manasikartavyā, tṛṣṇā pralopadharmato manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:571_7: tṛṣṇā calato manasikartavyā, tṛṣṇā prabhaṅgulato manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:574_6: jātī rogato manasikartavyā, jātir gaṇḍato manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:574_8: jātir aghato manasikartavyā, jātir ābādhato manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:574_9: jātiḥ parato manasikartavyā, jātiḥ pralopadharmato manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:574_10: jātiś calato manasikartavyā, jātiḥ prabhaṅgulato manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:576_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair dānapāramitāyāṃ caraty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:577_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:577_1: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāri samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:577_2: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāra ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:577_4: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ pañca balāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:577_5: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ sapta bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:577_7: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāry āryasatyāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:577_8: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāri dhyānāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:577_9: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāry apramāṇāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:577_10: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś (ŚsP II-2 137) cittotpādaiś catasra ārūpyasamāpattīr bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:577_11: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair aṣṭau vimokṣāṃ bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:577_18: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāri vaiśāradyāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:577_19: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catasraḥ pratisaṃvido bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:577_22: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair aṣṭā daśāveṇikabuddhadharmān bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:578_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate dharmā evaite dharmān abhiṣyandayanti pariṣyandayanti paripūrayanti parispharayanti parimīmāṃsyante,
S06sspp2_2u:578_1: nāsty atrātmā vā ātmīyaṃ va. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad bodhicitte na samavahitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:578_2: yad bodhicittaṃ tat pariṇāmanācitte na samavahitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:578_3: yat kauśika pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad bodhicitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:578_4: yad bodhicittaṃ tat pariṇāmanācitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_2u:578_5: iyaṃ kausika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā yad evaṃ sarvadharmāś ca pratyavekṣate na kvacid dharmeṣu paricarati.
S06sspp2_2u:579_0: evam ukte śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtisthaviram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:580_0: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūtte pariṇāmanācittaṃ bodhicitte na samavahitam?
S06sspp2_2u:582_0: kathaṃ pariṇāmanācittaṃ bodhicitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate?
S06sspp2_2u:583_1: kathaṃ bodhicittaṃ pariṇāmanācitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate?
S06sspp2_2u:584_0: subhūtir āha: yat kauśika pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad acittaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:584_1: yad bodhicittaṃ tad acittam, iti hi yad acittaṃ tad acintyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:584_2: yad acintyaṃ tad acittaṃ na hy acittatā acittatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati,
S06sspp2_2u:584_4: iti hi yā acittatā sā acintyatā yā acintyatā sā acittatā,
S06sspp2_2u:585_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayate sma:
S06sspp2_2u:585_1: sādhu sādhu subhūte sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitām upadiśasy utsāhaṃ dadāsi.
S06sspp2_2u:586_0: subhūtir āha: kṛtajñena mayā bhagavan bhavitavyaṃ nākṛtajñena,
S06sspp2_2u:586_1: tathā hi paurvakānāṃ tathāgatānām arham arhantāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike taiḥ śrāvakais tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu codito 'nuśiṣṭāḥ saṃdarśitaḥ samādāyitaḥ samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ yato bhagavaṃ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:586_2: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ evam eva bhagavann asmābhir bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv avavaditavyā anuśikṣitavyāḥ saṃharṣitavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:586_4: pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā, asmābhir api bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv avavaditā anuśiṣṭāḥ saṃharṣitāḥ samādāpitaḥ samuttejitāḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06sspp2_2u:587_0: athāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakram devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:587_1: tena hi kauśika śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:587_2: yathā ca na sthātavyaṃ rūpaṃ kauśika rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:587_3: vedanā vedanayā śūnyā, saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā, saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyāḥ, vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ, bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:587_4: iti hi kauśika rūpaśūnyatā ca vedanāśūnyatā ca saṃjñāśūnyatā ca saṃskāraśūnyatā ca vijñānaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_2u:587_5: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:588_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:588_2: ghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇena śūnyaṃ, jihvā jihvayā śūnyā, kāyaḥ kāyena śūnyaḥ, mano manasā śūnyaṃ, bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:588_3: iti hi kauśika cakṣuḥśūnyatā ca śrotraśūnyatā ca ghrāṇaśūnyatā ca jihvāśūnyatā ca kāyaśūnyatā ca manaḥśūnyatā ca bodisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_2u:588_4: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:589_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:589_1: śabdaḥ śabdena śūnyaḥ, gandho gandhena śūnyaḥ, raso rasena śūnyaḥ, sparśaḥ sparśena śūnyaḥ, dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ, bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:589_2: iti hi kauśika rūpaśūnyatā ca śabdaśūnyatā ca gandhaśūnyatā ca rasaśūnyatā ca sparśaśūnyatā ca dharmaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_2u:589_3: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:590_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika cakṣurvijnānaṃ cakṣurvijñānena śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:590_7: iti hi kauśika cakṣurvijñānaśūnyatā ca śrotravijñānaśūnyatā ca ghrāṇavijñānaśūnyatā ca jihvāvijñānaśūnyatā ca kāyavijñānaśūnyatā ca manovijnānaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_2u:590_8: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:591_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:591_7: iti hi kauśika cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatā ca śrotrasaṃsparśaśūnyatā ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśaśūnyatā ca jihvāsaṃsparśaśūnyatā ca kāyasaṃsparśaśūnyatā ca manaḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_2u:591_8: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:592_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāvedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāvedanayā śūnyā,
S06sspp2_2u:592_7: iti hi kauśika cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāvedanāśūnyatā ca śrotrasaṃsparśajāvedanāśūnyatā ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśajāvedanāśūnyatā ca jihvāsaṃsparśajāvedanāśūnyatā ca kāyasaṃsparśajāvedanāśūnyatā ca manaḥsaṃsparśajāvedanāśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_2u:592_8: evaṃ klialu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:593_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātunā śūnyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:593_1: abdhātur abdhātunā śūnyaḥ, tejodhātus tejodhātunā śūnyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:593_6: iti hi kauśika pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatā cābdhātuśūnyatā ca tejodhātuśūnyatā ca vāyudhātuśūnyatā c ākāśadhātuśūnyatā ca vijñānadhātuśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_2u:593_7: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:594_1: saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyāḥ, vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ, nāmarūpaṃ nāmarūpeṇa śūnyaṃ, ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ṣaḍāyatanena śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:594_2: sparśaḥ sparśena śūnyaḥ, vedanā vedanayā śūnyā, tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇayā śūnyā, upādānam upādānena śūnyaṃ, bhavo bhavena śūnyaḥ, jātir jātyā śūnyā, jarāmaraṇaṃ jarāmaraṇena śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:594_4: iti hi kauśikāvidyāśūnyatā ca saṃskāraśūnyatā ca vijñānaśūnyatā ca nāmarūpaśūnyatā ca ṣaḍāyatanaśūnyatā ca sparśaśūnyatā ca vedanāśūnyatā ca tṛṣṇāśūnyatā copādānaśūnyatā ca bhavaśūnyatā ca jātiśūnyatā ca jarāmaraṇaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_2u:594_5: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:595_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā śūnyā,
S06sspp2_2u:595_7: iti hi kauśika dānapāramitāśūnyatā ca śīlapāramitāśūnyatā ca kṣāntipāramitāśūnyatā ca vīryapāramitāśūnyatā ca dhyānapāramitāśūnyatā ca prajñāpāramitāśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_2u:595_8: (ŚsP II-2 141) evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:596_19: iti hi kauśikādhyātmaśūnyatā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā ca śūnyatāśūnyatā ca mahāśūnyatā ca paramārthaśūnyatā ca saṃskṛtaśūnyatā cāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā cātyantaśūnyatā cānavarāgraśūnyatā cānavakāraśūnyatā ca prakṛtiśūnyatā ca sarvadharmaśūnyatā ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā cānupalambhaśūnyatā cābhāvaśūnyatā ca svabhāvaśūnyatā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_2u:596_20: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:597_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:597_3: indriyāṇīndriyaiḥ śūnyāni, balāni balaiḥ śūnyāni, bodhyaṅgāni bodhyaṅgaiḥ śūnyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:597_6: iti hi kauśika smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatā ca samyakprahāṇaśūnyatā ca ṛddhipādaśūnyatā cendriyaśūnyatā ca balaśūnyatā ca bodhyaṅgaśūnyatā ca mārgaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_2u:597_7: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:598_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika āryasatyāny āryasatyaiḥ śūnyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:598_1: dhyānāni dhyānaiḥ śūnyāni, apramāṇāny apramāṇaiḥ śūnyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:598_5: abhijñā abhijñābhiḥ śūnyāḥ, samādhayaḥ samādhayaḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:598_14: iti hi kauśikāryasatyaśūnyatā ca dhyānaśūnyatā cāpramāṇaśūnyatā cārūpyasamāpattiśūnyatā ca vimokṣaśūnyatā cānupūrvavihārasamāpattiśūnyatā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhaśūnyatā cābhijñāśūnyatā ca samādhiśūnyatā ca dhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatā ca tathāgatabalaśūnyatā ca vaiśāradyaśūnyatā ca pratisaṃvidśūnyatā ca mahāmaitrīśūnyatā ca mahākaruṇāśūnyatā cāveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_2u:598_15: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:599_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika śrāvakayānaṃ śrāvakayānena śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:599_1: pratyekabuddhayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānena śūnyaṃ buddhayānaṃ buddhayānena śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:599_3: iti hi śrāvakayānaśūnyatā ca pratyekabuddhayānaśūnyatā ca buddhayānaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_2u:599_4: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:600_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika śrāvakaḥ śrāvakena śūnyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:600_2: buddho buddhena śūnyaḥ, bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:600_3: iti hi śrāvakaśūnyatā ca pratyekabuddhaśūnyatā ca buddhaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_2u:600_4: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:601_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika srotaāpattiphalaṃ srotaāpattiphalena śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:601_3: arhattvam arhattvena śūnyṃ, pratyekabodhiḥ pratyekabodhyā śūnyā,
S06sspp2_2u:601_7: iti hi śrotraāpattiphalaśūnyatā ca sakṛdāgāmiphalaśūnyatā cānāgāmiphalaśūnyatā cārhatphalaśūnyatā ca pratyekabodhiśūnyatā ca mārgākārajñatāśūnyatā (ŚsP II-2 143) ca sarvākārajñatāśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_2u:601_8: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:602_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:602_1: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na sthātavyam?
S06sspp2_2u:603_0: subhūtir āha: iti hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpe na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:608_5: manaḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ (ŚsP II-2 144) vedanāyāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:615_5: (ŚsP II-2 146) mana iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:625_0: rūpaṃ nityam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:625_1: rūpam anityam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:625_2: rūpaṃ sukham iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:625_3: rūpaṃ duḥkham iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:625_4: rūpam ātmety anātmeti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:625_5: rūpaṃ śubham ity aśubham iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:625_6: rūpaṃ śāntam ity aśāntam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:625_7: rūpaṃ viviktam ity aviviktam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:625_8: rūpaṃ śūnyam ity aśūnyam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:625_9: rūpaṃ nimittam ity animittam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:625_10: rūpaṃ praṇihitam ity apraṇihitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:626_0: vedanā nityety anityeti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.

S06sspp2_2u:627_5: (ŚsP II-2 149) saṃjñā viviktety avivikteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:627_6: saṃjñā śūnyety aśūnyeti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:627_7: saṃjñā nimittety animitteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:627_8: saṃjñā praṇihitety apraṇihiteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.

S06sspp2_2u:628_8: saṃskārāḥ praṇihitā ity apraṇihitā iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.

S06sspp2_2u:630_8: śrotraṃ praṇihitam ity apraṇihitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.

S06sspp2_2u:732_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika srotaāpattiphalam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:732_1: sakṛdāgāmiphalam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:732_2: anāgāmiphalam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:732_3: arhattvam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:732_4: pratyekabodhir asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:732_5: anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhir asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam (ŚsP II-2 178) iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:732_6: srotaāpannā dakṣiṇīyam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:732_7: sakṛdāgāmī dakṣiṇīyam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:732_8: anāgāmī dakṣiṇīyam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:732_9: arhan dakṣiṇīyam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:732_10: pratyekabuddho dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:732_11: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:733_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamāyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:734_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpāde sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:735_8: bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhabhūmau sthāsyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:736_2: pañcasu bodhisattvābhijñāsu sthitvā aprameyāny asaṃkhyeyāni buddhakṣetrāṇy upasaṃkramiṣyāmi buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya śrutvā ca tathatvāya parebhyo deśayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:737_0: yādṛśāni ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāni tadṛśāni eva pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:737_1: sattvān bodhau paripācayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:738_0: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃś ca lokadhātuṃ gatvā tān tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkariṣyāmīti gurukariṣyāmīti mānayiṣyāmīti pūjayiṣyāmīti,
S06sspp2_2u:738_1: puṣpamālyagandhavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ koṭīniyutaśatasahasraiś ca tāṃs tathāgatāṃ pūjayiṣyāmīty evam api na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:738_2: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:739_1: katamāni pañca? māṃsacakṣur divyacakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur utpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:739_3: yena yena punaḥ samādhīn ākāṅkṣayiṣyāmi vikrīḍituṃ tena tena samādhinā vikrīḍiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogema,
S06sspp2_2u:740_1: catvāri vaiśāradyāni pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:740_2: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:740_5: aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti evam api bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:740_6: dvātriṃśatāni mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni kāye pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam (ŚsP II-2 180) upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:740_7: aśīty anuvyañjanāni kāye pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:741_5: kulaṃkula ity ekavīcika iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:741_7: āyuḥkṣaye kleśakṣaye ceti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:741_9: sakṛdāgāmi sakṛd imaṃ lokam āgamya duḥkhasyāṃ taṃ kariṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:741_10: anāgagāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratikannaka iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:741_11: anāgāmi tatraiva nirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:741_12: arhatphalasākṣātkriyāyaiḥ pratipannaka iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:741_13: arhann ihaivānupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayiṣyatīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:741_15: atikramya śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ ca bodhisattvabhūmau sthāsyāmīti iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:742_0: mārgākārajñatājñāne sarvākārajñatāyāṃ ca na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:742_1: sarvākāraiḥ sarvadharmān abhisaṃbuddhā sarvāvāsanā na saṃvikte śakṣayāyāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:742_2: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakrapravartayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:742_3: buddhakārye kṛtvā aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti,
S06sspp2_2u:743_0: caturṣu ṛddhipādeṣu sthitvā tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpatsye yathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān tiṣṭheyam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:743_1: aparimitaś ca me āyur bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:744_0: dvātriṃśatāṃ me mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānām ekaikalakṣaṇaṃ śatapuṇyapariniṣpannaṃ bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:744_9: tāvanta ekaṃ me buddhakṣetraṃ bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:744_10: vajropamo me trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:745_0: bodhivṛkṣāś ca me tādṛśo gandho niścaret,
S06sspp2_2u:745_1: ye sattvās taṃ gandham ājighreyus teṣām na rāgadveṣamohāś ca vyābādheyur iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:745_2: na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittam utpadyeyur iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:745_3: sarve ca te niyatā bhaveyur anuttarāyā samyaksaṃbuddhāv iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:745_4: ye ca sattvās taṃ bodhivṛkṣagandham ājighreyus teṣāṃ na kaścid vyādhir bhaved kāye vā citte veti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:746_0: tatra ca me buddhakṣetre na rūpaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:746_1: na vedanāśabdo bhaven na saṃjñāśabdo bhaven na saṃskāraśabdo bhaven na vijñānaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:747_0: na dhātuśabdo nāyatanaśabdo na pratītyasamutpādaśabdo bhaved iti sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:748_0: na dānapāramitāśabdo bhaven na śīlapāramitāśabdo bhaven na kṣāntipāramitāśabdo bhaven na vīryapāramitāśabdo bhaven na dhyānapāramitāśabdo bhaven na prajñāpāramitāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:749_0: nādhyātmaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na bahirdhāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:749_1: na śūnyatāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na mahāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na paramārthaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na saṃsrtaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:749_2: nātyantaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānavarāgraśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānavakāraśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na prakṛtiśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:749_3: na sarvadharmaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānupalambhaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:749_4: nābhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na svabhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:749_5: (ŚsP II-2 182) na smṛtyupasthānaśabdo bhaven na samyakprahāṇaśabdo bhaven na ṛddhipādaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:749_6: nendriyaśabdo bhaven na balaśabdo bhaven na bodhyaṅgaśabdo bhaven nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaśabdo bhaven nāryasatyaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavaym upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:749_7: na dhyānaśabdo bhaven nāpramāṇaśabdo bhaven nārūpyasamāpattiśabdo bhaven na vimokṣaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:749_8: nānupūrvavihārasamāpattiśabdo bhaven na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhaśabdo bhaven nābhijñāśabdo bhaven na samādhiśabdo bhaven na dhāraṇīmukhaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:749_9: na tathāgatabalaśabdo bhaven na vaiśāradyaśabdo bhaven na pratisaṃvidśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:749_10: na mahāmaitrīśabdo bhaven na mahākaruṇāśabdo bhaven nāveṇikabuddhadharmaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:749_11: na srotaāpattiśabdo bhaven na sakṛdāgāmiśabdo bhaven nānāgāmiśabdo bhaven nārhattvaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:749_12: na pratyekabuddhaśabdo bhaven na buddhaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:749_13: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarvadharmā nopalabdhāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:750_0: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:751_1: kathaṃ punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam?
S06sspp2_2u:752_0: athāyuṣmataḥ subhūtir āyuṣmataḥ śāradvatīputrasya cetasyaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmataṃ śāradvatīputram āmantrayati sma.
S06sspp2_2u:752_1: tat kiṃ manyase? āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra kva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:753_0: āha: na kvacid āyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthita iti apratisthitamānasaḥ khalu punar āyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa rūpe na sthito vedanāyāṃ na sthitaḥ saṃjñāyāṃ na sthitaḥ saṃskāreṣu na sthito vijñāne na sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:754_0: na cakṣuṣi sthito na śrotre sthito na ghrāṇe sthito na jihvāyāṃ sthito na kāye sthito na manasi sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:755_1: na rūpe sthito na śabde sthito na gandhe sthito na rase sthito na sparśe sthito na dharmeṣu sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:756_0: na cakṣurvijñāne sthito na śrotravijñāne sthito na ghrāṇavijñāne sthito na jihvāvijñāne sthito na kāyavijñāne sthito na manovijñāne sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:757_0: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe sthito na śrotrasaṃsparśe sthito na ghrāṇasaṃsparśe sthito na jihvāsaṃsparśe sthito na kāyasaṃsparśe sthito na manaḥsaṃsparśe sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:758_0: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:758_1: na pṛthivīdhātau sthito nābdhātau sthito na tejodhātau sthito na vāyudhātau sthito nākāśadhātau sthito na vijñānadhātau sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:759_0: nāvidyāyāṃ sthito na saṃskāreṣu sthito na vijñāne sthito na nāmarūpe sthito na ṣaḍāyatane sthito na sparśe sthito na vedanāyāṃ sthito na tṛṣṇāyāṃ sthito nopādāne sthito na bhave sthito na jātau sthito na jarāmaraṇe sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:760_0: na dānapāramitāyāṃ sthito na śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito na vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:761_0: nādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na mahāśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nātyantaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nānavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nānavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nānupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nābhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:761_1: na smṛtyupasthāneṣu sthito na samyakprahāṇeṣu sthito na ṛddhipādeṣu sthito nendriyeṣu sthito na baleṣu sthito na bodhyaṅgeṣu sthito nāryāṣṭāṅge marge sthito nāryasatyeṣu sthito na dhyāneṣu sthito nāpramāṇeṣu sthito nārūpyasamāpattiṣu sthito na vimokṣeṣu sthito nānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu sthito na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukheṣu sthito nābhijñāsu sthito na samādhiṣu sthito na dhāraṇīmukheṣu (ŚsP II-2 184) sthito na tathāgatabaleṣu sthito na vaiśāradyeṣu sthito na pratisaṃvitsu sthito na mahāmaitryā sthito na mahākaruṇāyāṃ sthito nāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu sthito na sarvajñatāyāṃ sthito na mārgākārajñatāyāṃ sthito na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:762_0: subhūtir āha: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:762_1: yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rūpe naiva sthito nāsthito vedanāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ samjñāyām naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ saṃskāreṣu naiva sthito nāsthito vijñāne naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:763_0: cakṣuṣi naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śrotre naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇe naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāye naiva sthito nāsthito manasi naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:764_0: rūpe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śabde naiva sthito nāsthito gandhe naiva sthito nāsthito rase naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ sparśe naiva sthito nāsthito dharmeṣu naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:765_0: cakṣurvijñāne naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śrotravijñāne naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇavijñāne naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāvijñāne naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāyavijñāne naiva sthito nāsthito manovijñāne naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:766_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇasaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāsaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāyasaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthito manaḥsaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:767_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ
S06sspp2_2u:768_0: pṛthivīdhātau naiva sthito nāsthito 'bdhātau naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ tejodhātau naiva sthito nāsthito vāyudhātau naiva sthito nāsthita ākāśadhātau naiva sthito nāsthito vijñānadhātau naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:769_0: avidyāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ saṃskāreṣu naiva sthito nāsthito vijñāne naiva sthito nāsthito nāmarūpe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ ṣaḍāyatane naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ sparśe naiva sthito nāsthito vedanāyāṃ naiva sthito (ŚsP II-2 185) nāsthitaḥ tṛṣṇāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthita upādāne naiva sthito nāsthito bhave naiva sthito nāsthito jātau naiva sthito nāsthito jarāmaraṇe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:770_0: dānapāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito vīryapāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito dhyānapāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:771_0: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito mahāśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito 'tyantaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito navarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito 'navakāraśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito 'nupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito 'bhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:773_0: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ sthātavyam ity asthānayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:774_1: atha khalu tatra parṣadi keṣāñcid devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S06sspp2_2u:774_2: yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣarutāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni vijñāyante,
S06sspp2_2u:774_3: tāni mantrayamāṇāni, idaṃ punar api na vijñāyate yad āryasubhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate pravyāharati deśayati vibhajaty uttānīkaroti upadiśati.
S06sspp2_2u:775_0: athāyuṣmān subhūtis teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān āmantrayate sma,
S06sspp2_2u:777_0: subhūtir āha: tathā hi devaputrā ekākṣaram api na pravyāhrite tan na śruyate yan na śruyate tan na vijñāyate.
S06sspp2_2u:777_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy akṣarāṇi prajñāpāramitā na cātra kaścid deśayitā na śrotā na vijñātā.
S06sspp2_2u:777_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? anakṣarā hi devaputrās tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ tad yathāpi nāma devaputrās tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho buddhanirmitaṃ nirmimīte.
S06sspp2_2u:777_3: sa ca punar nirmitaś catasraparṣado nirmimītaḥ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:778_0: atha sa nirmitaḥ tābhyo nirmitābhyaś catasṛbhyaḥ parṣadbhyo dharmaṃ deśayet.
S06sspp2_2u:778_2: api tu tatra parṣadi kenacid deśitaṃ bhavet? kenacic chrutam ājñātaṃ ca bhavet?
S06sspp2_2u:780_0: subhūtir āha: evam eva devaputrāḥ sarvadharmā nirmitopamās tatra kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:780_1: tad yathāpi nāma devaputrāḥ svapnāntaragataḥ puruṣas tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhadharmaṃ deśayantaṃ paśyet.
S06sspp2_2u:780_3: api nu tatra deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā ājñātaṃ vā bhavet.
S06sspp2_2u:782_0: subhūtir āha: evam eva devaputrāḥ svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmās tatra na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacid śrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātaṃ tad yathāpi nāma devaputrāḥ dvau puruṣau parvatakandare sthitvā buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ dharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ saṃghasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:782_3: api nu tenaikena pratiśrutkāśabdena dvitīyapratiśrutkāśabdo vijñāpito bhavet.
S06sspp2_2u:784_0: subhūtir āha: evam eva devaputrāḥ sarvadharmāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:784_1: tatra na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:784_2: tad yathāpi nāma devaputrā dakṣo māyākāro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham abhinirmimīte.
S06sspp2_2u:784_3: catasraś ca parṣado 'binirmimīto bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāśikāḥ sa ca nirmitas tābhyo nirmitābhyaḥ parṣadbhyo dharmaṃ deśayet.
S06sspp2_2u:784_5: api nu tatra kenacid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā ājñātaṃ vā bhavet.
S06sspp2_2u:786_0: subhūtir āha: evam eva devaputrā māyopamāḥ sarvadharmās tatra na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacid ājñātam.
S06sspp2_2u:787_1: uttarīkariṣyati batāyam āryasthaviraḥ subhūtir uttānīkariṣyati batāyam āryasthaviraḥ subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitām iti,
S06sspp2_2u:787_2: atha ca punar gambhīrād gambhīrataraṃ deśayati,
S06sspp2_2u:788_0: athāyuṣmān subhūtis teṣām devaputrāṇām cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:788_1: na khalu devaputrā rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:788_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? na rūpasvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:789_3: na jihvā gambhīrā na śūkṣmā, na kāyo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ, na mano gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmam.
S06sspp2_2u:789_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? na cakṣuḥsvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:789_7: na jihvāsvabhāvo (ŚsP II-2 188) gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:790_3: na raso gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ, na sparśo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:790_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? na rūpasvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:791_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? na cakṣurvijñānasvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:792_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:793_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāsvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:793_10: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāsvabhāvo (ŚsP II-2 189) gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:794_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? na pṛthivīdhātusvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:795_0: nāvidyā gambhīrā na śūkṣmā, na saṃskārā gambhīrā na śūkṣmāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:795_6: na tṛṣṇā gambhīrā na śūkṣmā, nopādānaṃ gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:795_8: na jātir gambhīrā na śūkṣmā, na jarāmaraṇaṃ gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmam.
S06sspp2_2u:795_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? nāvidyāsvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:796_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? na dānapāramitāsvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:797_3: na śūnyatāśūnyatā (ŚsP II-2 190) gambhīrā na śūkṣmā,
S06sspp2_2u:797_18: tat kasya hetoḥ? nādhyātmaśūnyatāsvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:797_27: nānavarāgraśūnyatāsvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ nānavakāraśūnyatāsvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:798_18: na vaiśāradyāni gambhīrāṇi na (ŚsP II-2 191) śūkṣmāṇi,
S06sspp2_2u:798_23: tat kasya hetoḥ? na smṛtyupasthānasvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:799_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? na sarvajñatāsvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:800_1: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ rūpaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:801_0: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣuḥ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:802_0: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ rūpaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:803_0: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:804_0: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ prajñapitaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:806_0: na pṛthivīdhātuḥ prajñapitaḥ, nābdhātuḥ prajñapitaḥ, na tejodhātuḥ prajñapitaḥ, na vāyudhātuḥ prajñapitaḥ, nākāśadhātuḥ prajñapitaḥ, na vijñānadhātuḥ prajñapitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:809_3: na mahāśūnyatā prajñapitā, na paramārthaśūnyatā prajñapitā,
S06sspp2_2u:810_0: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānāni prajñapitāni,
S06sspp2_2u:810_2: na ṛddhipādāḥ prajñapitāḥ, nendriyāṇi prajñapitāni, na balāni prajñapitāni, na bodhyaṅgāni prajñapitāni, nāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñapitaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:810_3: nāryasatyāni prajñapitāni, na dhyānāni prajñapitāni, nāpramāṇāni prajñapitāni, nārūpyasamāpattayaḥ prajñapitāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:810_7: nābhijñāḥ prajñapitāḥ, na samādhayaḥ prajñapitāḥ, na dhāraṇīmukhāni prajñapitāni,
S06sspp2_2u:810_11: na mahāmaitrī prajñapitā, na mahākaruṇā prajñapitā, nāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prajñapitāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:811_0: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ srotaāpannaḥ prajñapito na srotaāpattiphalaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:811_1: na sakṛdāgāmī prajñapito na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:811_4: na pratyekabuddhaḥ prajñapito na pratyekabodhiḥ prajñapitā,
S06sspp2_2u:811_5: na bodhisattvaḥ prajñapito na bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ prajñapitāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:811_6: na buddhaḥ prajñapito na bodhiḥ prajñapitā,
S06sspp2_2u:812_0: athāyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:812_1: evam etad devaputrā evam etad iti tad anabhilāpyā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddānāṃ bodhiḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:812_2: apravyāhārā sā na kenacid chrutā na vijñātā.
S06sspp2_2u:813_0: tena hi devaputrā ye srotaāpattiphale sthātukāmāḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06sspp2_2u:813_1: ye sakṛdāgāmiphale sthātukāmāḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06sspp2_2u:813_2: ye 'nāgāmīphale sthātukāmā anāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06sspp2_2u:813_3: ye 'rhattve sthātukāmā arhattvaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06sspp2_2u:813_4: ye pratyekabodhau sthātukāmāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ sākṣātkartukamā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06sspp2_2u:813_5: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthātukāmā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya.
S06sspp2_2u:814_0: evaṃ khalu devaputrā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:815_0: śatasāhasryāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvitīyakhaṇḍe caturdaśamaḥ parivartaḥ samāptaḥ.
